title: Read Genotype Data To R
text: goal geno2r easily import genotype data various formats R. HTSlib wrapped imported Rsamtools, enhance VCF reading speed. order efficiently read VCF file, compressed bgzip indexed tabix.

title: Read Genotype Data To R
text: can install recent version geno2r GitHub :

text: basic example shows read VCF data R read_vcf():

text: can find example VCF file Github.

what: geno2r: Read Genotype Data To R — geno2r-package
title: geno2r: Read Genotype Data To R — geno2r-package
text: package, find functions allow read genotype data R environment.

title: geno2r: Read Genotype Data To R — geno2r-package
Read VCF to R — read_vcf
text: function reads VCF file R converts data.table format. genomic range given, HTSlib, wrapped C library, reads directly region instead loading full VCF file memory. mandatory compress VCF file using bgzip create index using tabix.

title: Read VCF to R — read_vcf
text: file VCF file. range specify range want read genome. e.g. "1:1000-100000" (genomic range), "1:12345" (single variant), NULL (variants) reformat Default: TRUE. Reformat VCF file genome matrix marker information table. FALSE, return original VCF file table.

title: Read VCF to R — read_vcf
text: VCF file loaded converted matrix data.table format (dependents reformat option). genomic matrix uses 0/1/2 coding system represent number alternative alleles present.
